description: Sunderland have opened talks with Bordeaux for Tunisia international Wahbi Khazri. The talented 24-year-old has been on Sunderland's radar for months.
title: Sunderland in talks with Bordeaux over Tunisian forward Wahbi Khazri
title_page: Sunderland in talks with Bordeaux over Tunisian forward Wahbi Khazri  | Daily Mail Online
text:
Sunderland have opened talks with Bordeaux for Tunisia international Wahbi Khazri.
The talented 24-year-old has been on Sunderland's radar for months and Sam Allardyce and his scouting team have followed up on earlier reports after being impressed in recent weeks.
Swansea, Aston Villa and Everton had also followed Khazri who plays as across the frontline behind the striker or cutting in from the left.
Sunderland have opened talks with Bordeaux for Tunisia international Wahbi Khazri
He is a fiery character, born in Corsica, and has six goals in 13 games for Tunisia.
It comes after Sunderland failed in a move for Swansea forward Andre Ayew earlier this week.
Allardyce has already brought in striker Dame N'Doye on loan from Trabzonspor this month, although he is yet to play for the Black Cats.
